metadata.title: CVE-2022-0480 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the filelock_init in fs/locks.c function in the Linuxkernel. This issue can lead to host memory exhaustion due to memcg notlimiting the number of Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX) filelocks.
